Federation of Musicians, the on~y union in town.
While I was there he received word that the Board of Regents of the University
approved hie doing a series of shows from Texas Southern University which is the
Negro university in that area. His one difficulty is that he has been unable
to obtain funds from any major foundations largely because many of them regard
KOHT as semi-faBoist, This, of course, is not so and they are doing their
utmost to counteract this vicious rumor.
As I said, I think you, Walter and l should discuss this matter further.
Sincerely,
/a/ Morris Novik
